experience.title: Front-end Engineer
points: Prototyped and started planning on an architecture for next generation analytics applications using NodeJS and YUI3
Worked with the rest of the front-end team to analyze modern web frameworks and give valueable feedback to management
Supported and added features to legacy analytics applications in both php and java environments

experience.title: Front-end Intern
points: Developed many features of a major analytics project involving complex data management and visualizations
Took part in daily team meetings and worked closely with other team members to accomplish common goals
Developed a ﬁrm understanding of agile development (Scrum) and working with others’ code
Learned the best practices for front end web development involving JavaScript syntax and other language based problems

experience.title: IT Intern
points: Involved in many different ﬁelds ranging from telecommunications to desktop support
Learned correct business etiquette working with a wide range of people in a professional environment
Took part in handling desktop support for 500+ internal employees
